titleStmt.title: The register of Bath, or, Two hundred observations containing an account of cures performed, and benefit received, by the vse of the famous hot waters of Bath, in the county of Somerset, as they, for the most part, came under the observation and knowledge of Thomas Guidott, physician there : being great part of this experience of the effects of the baths of Bath, for XXVII years last past.
titleStmt.author: Guidott, Thomas, fl. 1698.

titleStmt.title: The register of Bath, or, Two hundred observations containing an account of cures performed, and benefit received, by the vse of the famous hot waters of Bath, in the county of Somerset, as they, for the most part, came under the observation and knowledge of Thomas Guidott, physician there : being great part of this experience of the effects of the baths of Bath, for XXVII years last past.
titleStmt.author: Guidott, Thomas, fl. 1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Leach for the author, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,
